Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name Character Encoding Translator
Description Character Encoding Translator is a bundled API and utility for translating text from one character encoding to another. The API supports the ability to replace unmappable characters with their XML character reference equivalents, a useful feature when preparing text for use on the Web. The utility may be used as a Swing GUI or as a console application.
Homepage http://ninthtest.net/character-encoding-translator/
